item.logincontainer:
<style>

/* User Register Link */
.user_login_register {

}

#loginform {
width: 300px;
}

/* Login Form */
#loginform label{
font-size:20px;
font-weight:bold;
display:block;
}

/* Login Username Field */
.user_login_username {
height:30px;
padding:5px;
border:none;
outline:none;
width:250px;
-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 1px rgba(50,50,50,.4);
-moz-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 1px rgba(50,50,50,.4);
-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 1px rgba(50,50,50,.4);
box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 1px rgba(50,50,50,.4);
-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
-moz-border-radius: 4px;
border-radius: 4px;
}

/* Login Password Field */
.user_login_password {
height:30px;
padding:5px;
border:none;
outline:none;
width:250px;
-webkit-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 1px rgba(50,50,50,.4);
-moz-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 1px rgba(50,50,50,.4);
-o-box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 1px rgba(50,50,50,.4);
box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 1px rgba(50,50,50,.4);
-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
-moz-border-radius: 4px;
border-radius: 4px;
}

/* Login Submit Button */
.user_login_submit {
border: none;
outline: none;
background-color: rgb(88,153,206);
height: 30px;
width: auto;
padding: 0 15px;
color: rgb(255,255,255);
-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
-moz-border-radius: 4px;
border-radius: 4px;
}

</style>
item.welcomebox:
<style>
/* Span Tag Around "Welcome" Text */
.user-login-welcome-label {
font-size:30px;
font-weight:bold;
}

/* Logout Link */
.user-login-logout-link {
display:block;
}

.user_login_welcome_box_container {
font-size:13px;
width:100%;
}

</style>
item.protectedmessage: Для просмотра этой страницы вы должны зарегистрироваться.
item.registerbox:
<style>
.user-login-register-title {

}

/* Register Form Labels */
#registerform label{
font-size:13px;
font-weight:bold;
display:block;
}
#registerform input.required{
height:17px;
padding:2px;
border:1px solid gray;
width:150px;
}
#registerform input#register{
padding:3px;
margin:5px 0;
}

</style>
